name: Primary Attributes
description: Core attributes that influence the development of all skills

items.name: Intelligence
items.description: Affects learning speed of cognitive skills and analytical thinking

items.name: Creativity
items.description: Affects innovation, problem-solving, and artistic skills

items.name: Focus
items.description: Affects attention to detail, concentration, and skill retention

items.name: Adaptability
items.description: Affects skill transfer, cross-discipline learning, and versatility

items.name: Discipline
items.description: Affects consistency in skill growth and reduces decay rates

name: Analytical Skills
description: Skills involving data analysis, problem-solving, and logical thinking

items.name: Map Awareness
items.description: Ability to read and understand maps and geographical layouts

items.name: Data Analysis
items.description: Ability to interpret and derive insights from data sets

items.name: Pattern Recognition
items.description: Ability to identify patterns, trends, and correlations

items.name: Critical Thinking
items.description: Ability to analyze information objectively and make reasoned judgments

name: Technical Skills
description: Skills involving specialized technical knowledge and application

items.name: Programming
items.description: Ability to write and understand code across various languages

items.name: Technical Writing
items.description: Ability to create clear documentation and instructions

items.name: Software Design
items.description: Ability to architect and design software systems

name: Creative Skills
description: Skills involving artistic expression and innovative thinking

items.name: Visual Design
items.description: Ability to create aesthetically pleasing visual compositions

items.name: Creative Writing
items.description: Ability to craft engaging stories and narratives

items.name: Innovation
items.description: Ability to generate novel ideas and solutions

name: Social Skills
description: Skills involving interpersonal interaction and communication

items.name: Communication
items.description: Ability to convey ideas clearly and effectively

items.name: Empathy
items.description: Ability to understand and share the feelings of others

items.name: Leadership
items.description: Ability to guide and inspire others towards shared goals

items.name: Negotiation
items.description: Ability to reach agreements that satisfy multiple parties

name: Practical Skills
description: Skills involving real-world application and physical activities

items.name: Navigation
items.description: Ability to find and follow routes in various environments

items.name: Time Management
items.description: Ability to organize time effectively to maximize productivity

items.name: Organization
items.description: Ability to structure and arrange resources efficiently

name: Cognitive Skills
description: Skills involving mental processes and intellectual capabilities

items.name: Problem Solving
items.description: Ability to identify issues and develop effective solutions

items.name: Decision Making
items.description: Ability to choose between options effectively and confidently

items.name: Strategic Thinking
items.description: Ability to plan and anticipate long-term outcomes

items.name: Systems Thinking
items.description: Ability to understand complex interrelated systems and components
